title: Lest We Forget - Bob Walker
description:
Lest We Forget gives an overview of those involved in translating the Word of God into the English language from the late 1300's to 1611. It chronicles the lives and sacrifices of those men as well as the Bibles they produced. This book shows the hand of God on the translators throughout the 16th century as they risked their lives to get the Word of God to the common people. Many of whom were burned at the stake for their part in the translating the Bible. Thus leading to the number one selling book of all time, the blessed King James Bible!


About the author:
Bob Walker is an evangelist based out of Larned, Kansas. He and his wife, Phyllis, are faithful members of Larned Independent Baptist Church in Larned, Kansas. They have labored in the ministry since 1985
